The 3000-person sample was randomly selected from the respondents of the Omnibus surveys made in 2000; these repondents had to be on the phone, and be over 18 years. From this sample, the interviewers had to interview 1000 persons, in the order of the prepared telephone list.
Telephone interview based on questionnaire.
